Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Our teacher is always going to be better as they have a holistic approach to the university. They know the specifics the university requires, the rules, what resources it has that can be beneficial and the feedback is always more customised and specific.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I always trust my lectures the most. You have to take anything AI gives you with a grain of salt and fact check. I never fully trust AI and never will, it is only a tool and not the answer to everything.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: You have to take anything AI gives you with a grain of salt and fact check. I never fully trust AI and never will, it is only a tool and not the answer to everything.
